articles.title: The ‘Long-Term Danger’ of Trump Sending Troops to the LA Protests
articles.description: President Trump’s deployment of more than 700 Marines to Los Angeles—following ICE raids and mass protests—has ignited a fierce national debate over state sovereignty and civil-military boundaries.
